title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole jelly in a dream?

preview.html: Why do you dream of jelly in a complete dream? Jelly is a type of sweet known in the modern era, so we have collected for you, our followers, everything related to the interpretation of jelly in a complete dream from the books of major scholars and the interpretation of dreams and visions and through the Trend website specialized in the sciences of interpretation. Here, my dear, are all the details of the interpretation of the dream of eating red jelly for the pot, for married and pregnant women, as well as for men. Why dream of jelly in a dream in full? The interpretation of seeing jelly in a dream in full is one of the visions that indicate happiness and joy and a sign of the wedding of the world. By seeing beautiful jelly that lightens the appetite, its signs indicate that it has He went through difficult stages in the life of the fortuneteller. Seeing jelly in a dream also indicates marriage to an evil person or someone who is not from the dreamer’s city in which he lives. In a dream, jelly, and its taste is delicious, it indicates goodness, abundance of food, abundance of food, and evidence of blessings. Snow In a dream, complete for a common woman. If a woman eats a bowl of jelly in a dream, this indicates the approaching engagement and marriage of the one she loves and desires, and the best thing about it is that the color of the jelly is red. Also, seeing jelly in a complete dream for an ordinary woman indicates the great happiness that she will enjoy in the future. The next period of her life. It is clear in a dream that a married woman has completed. A married woman buys jelly in a dream that is complete – a sign of stability and improvement in life, her physical and psychological condition. Seeing red jelly in a dream filled with a married woman is one of the visions that testify to the intense mutual love between her and Her husband. Giving jelly to children and husbands is good news and evidence of their successes and achievements in life. Jelly in a pregnant woman’s completed dream. Seeing jelly in a pregnant woman’s completed dream testifies to the improvement of her health and morale, comfort of childbirth, and ease of delivery. Seeing a woman’s pink jelly in a dream is full of visions that indicate That the woman has been given food and God knows what is in the womb. Why dream of red jelly in Kamel’s dream? Seeing red jelly in a dream indicates love, romance, contentment, spirit, and peace of mind. Red jelly in Kamel’s dream is one of the visions that testify to the marriage of a divorced woman and compensation for her lost grief. Cooking Jelly in a dream shows the dreamer that he will fulfill many desires and overcome difficult stages in his life. Why does jelly dream? Why dream that you are eating red jelly in a complete dream is one of the desired visions that indicate happiness and pleasure. Using red jelly in a patient’s dream is a sign of recovery. The quick and fast cure from all diseases. A bowl of jelly in a dream is complete. Seeing many bowls of jelly in different colors in a complete dream is evidence that the dreamer has earned a lot of halal money. Also, eating yellow jelly in a complete dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from a health injury that will affect his health. His life during this period, but he will recover from it, God willing. Why do you dream of red jelly? Red jelly in a dream is the dreamer’s path to happiness and joy, as well as feeling better.

title: Interpretation of seeing a stolen car in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of car theft in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com, such as seeing a car theft in a dream, as interpretations that indicate goodness. Or bad, referring to the corruption of the dreamer’s morals and his distance from the teachings of his religion. As for bringing goodness and livelihood, we will talk about all of these interpretations through this article for the individual, married, pregnant, married, young, single, and divorced. What is the interpretation of seeing a stolen car in a dream for a single girl? Seeing a single girl stealing a car in a dream is a sign of her failure to find the job she wants. Seeing a single girl stealing her car in a dream is an indication of her failure in her social and academic life. Seeing a single woman getting a car gift from her fiancé. And stealing it is an indication of his high morals, their intense love for each other, and their long struggle together. Seeing in a dream that the car has been restored after it was stolen indicates facing some difficulties and problems in order to achieve one’s goals and ambitions. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car driving with a dead person in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a married woman Stealing a car in a dream? Seeing a married woman stealing her car in a dream indicates that her husband was robbed by his beloved owner at work. Seeing a married woman stealing a car from her husband in a dream indicates the corruption of his morals, bribery, and the corruption of his work. Seeing a car stolen in a married woman’s dream indicates... The hardship of life and her exposure to a major financial crisis. Seeing a married woman recovering her car after it was stolen indicates her husband’s love for her and his pursuit of her happiness and securing her future. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a man stealing a car in a dream? Seeing a man stealing a car in a dream indicates his ambitions. Seeing a married man stealing his car in a dream is a sign that he has followed the path of corruption and lust to reach his life’s dream and achieve great gains. Seeing a man saving his car from theft is an indication of his good morals and his distance from haraam money. Seeing a man recovering his car after stealing It was stolen. It indicates many bad friends in his life and their attempt to destroy his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman stealing a car in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman stealing a car in a dream is an indication of trying to solve his problems in the wrong way that leads to failure. Seeing a pregnant woman stealing A car in a dream indicates many disagreements and marital problems that lead to divorce. Seeing a married pregnant woman stealing a luxury car in a dream is an indication of her failure to manage her internal affairs and solve their problems. Seeing a pregnant woman buying an expensive car and displaying it in the car indicates the approaching date of childbirth, facilitating her affairs, and providing her with a son. The good that will bring her the best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car key in a dream. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees a car stolen in a dream? Seeing a young man stealing his car in a dream indicates constant fear and anxiety about the future. Seeing restored

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person’s will

preview.html: A dream about a will for the dead by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams. An official order under the protection of God Almighty in a dream. It shows attention to some matters that the dreamer is exposed to, and his affairs will be well facilitated. The will in general in a dream indicates many important things in life. A will also indicates many important things. In life that should receive great attention. The will of the dead person for NabulSeeing the will of the dead person in a dream, and everyone agreed to it, is not a condition for implementing it in reality, especially if it is violated. If someone in a dream sees the dead person on his deathbed, he advises everyone around him, this is A message to them that they are warning of some things that are not good in their lives and that are causing them problems. Interpretation of a dream about the will of the deceased for an unmarried womanIf an unmarried girl dreams that one of her parents has given her, this indicates the kindness and support that she will receive. For the unmarried girl who sees herself making A will for some people in a dream, this indicates some things that she hides and wants to reveal. Seeing a deceased woman’s will for a married woman. If a married woman sees it in the dream, presenting it to her children shows her extreme fear of illness and failure in life. But if she sees her husband presenting it in a dream, this indicates the need to be careful about Not neglecting her home. Dreaming of a dead person’s willIf a man sees in a dream his will for someone in a dream, this indicates positions of prestige that the dreamer will gain. If a man in a dream receives a will from a dead person, this indicates the need to preserve his property and carry out this will. To see a young man In a dream that he presents to everyone around him, this indicates that he is a very successful person in his life. Seeing a dead man’s will for a pregnant woman. A pregnant female vision. If she dreams that she is receiving a will from her dead husband, this indicates the kindness and abundant living that she will receive. But if she dreams that she is presenting someone to her child This indicates that she wants to attract the attention of some people around her. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of the sky in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the sky in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is one of the dreams that has many interpretations, which differ depending on the dreamer, whether the dreamer is single, married, or pregnant. The vision varies according to its viewer, as there is a dream of seeing a person in the sky, or dreaming of planets, or seeing an opening. in the sky. For site followers, it is not good to give any interpretation of any vision, whether on our site or from any other site, on a vision that the dreamer saw, except for the opinion of the dream interpretation scientist known for his effectiveness and forensic science, so that life problems do not arise as a result of wrong conclusions. You may also be interested in: Bathing in A dream: Interpretation of seeing the sky in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the sky in a dream: Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing the sky in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that may indicate a happy life and an imminent pregnancy for a married woman. Also, this vision for an unmarried girl can indicate some changes that will occur in the life of this woman. Girl for the better. In addition to dreaming of a violet sky, this vision comes from humanity that can herald fun and play. As for dreaming of splitting the sky, it may be an indication of the presence of some dreams and desires that are difficult to achieve. You may be interested in: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing the sky in a dream for a woman Single and married: A married woman sees heaven and heaven in her dream. This could be one of the human things to be happy in marriage and family stability. Just like a girl who dreams of a clear sky, this could be one of the good things that she will marry soon – God willing. Ibn Sirin says that if A pregnant woman saw a blue sky. This may be an indication of the approaching date of her birth, and it could also portend the safety of the fetus - God willing. Seeing the sky in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees the sky in black, this may be an indication of the problems and issues that this woman faces. Also, if a pregnant woman sees dark clouds in her dream, this expresses the intense anxiety that this woman suffers from, which affects her family. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream Seeing the sky splitting in a dream When the sky splits in a rolling dream, this may be An indication of the loss that the trader will suffer. Just like a pregnant woman who sees the sky torn apart in a dream, this may be one of the signs of the approaching birth - God willing. As for the unmarried girl and the unmarried young man who sees the clouds parting, this may be a sign of the approaching marriage - God willing - and a happy life. Seeing a person in the sky in a dream When you dream of a person in the sky who enjoys a wonderful position, this can indicate the high position that the dreamer will be able to reach. Such as dreaming of a person in the sky and the presence of clouds at the same time, this may be an indication On the dreamer's fear of failure. You may also be interested in: Washing the dead Seeing looking at the sky in a dream When you dream of looking for one girl in the sky, this could be a good thing

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about tomatoes and cucumbers according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about tomatoes and cucumbers: One of the most important vegetables that helps build the body and is full of vitamins and minerals and is considered one of the visions that is repeated many times in a dream. According to the viewer’s marital status, single, male, married, divorced, pregnant, follow us until the end to find out all the interpretations... Interpretation of a dream about tomatoes and cucumbers. Seeing tomatoes in a dream, but their color is green, means suffering, hardship, and toil, but comfort comes from God in the near future. Vision The dreamer eating rotten tomatoes is a sign of a bad omen that may occur. Seeing cucumbers in a dream symbolizes unhappiness and exhaustion. Rotten and smelly tomatoes indicate material losses from a forbidden source and also indicate divorce or annulment. Choosing indicates difficulties and crises that the fortuneteller must overcome to reach To the desired goal and achieve it. Seeing cucumbers and tomatoes in a dream indicates halal livelihood and multiple benefits. If the dreamer sees that he is preparing a salad with cucumbers and tomatoes, the vision shows a combination of actions that indicate good and evil, but in the case of buying tomatoes and cucumbers and they are unusable This indicates disappointment. Which the dreamer faces and the feeling of weakness and failure. Interpretation of a dream about tomatoes and cucumbers by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of the dream that seeing tomatoes in a dream for the dreamer is a sign of good treatment, good morals, increased benefits, a halal diet, and an indication of earning abundant money. If the dreamer sees cucumbers in a dream, this indicates To depression, suffering and unhappiness. An unmarried young man who saw tomatoes in his dream indicates that he has sincere feelings for the girl and that he will marry her and marry her in the end. In the event that the dreamer falls ill and dreams that he is eating tomatoes in a dream, the vision indicates recovery and similar recovery during the coming period. He says Ibn Sirin: Seeing tomatoes in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate goodness, increased livelihood and resources, and many benefits. Interpretation of a dream about tomatoes and cucumbers for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman eating tomatoes in a dream indicates her relationship with a good person, and this relationship will end in marriage. The unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she She eats an unfit tomato that tastes bad and ugly, indicating that she is in a relationship, but this relationship will not be completed. An unmarried woman who sees cucumbers in her dream is a sign of unhappiness and sadness. Tomatoes in a person’s dream show understanding, intimacy, calmness, and sobriety, and this makes people respect her. Seeing A lot of tomatoes in a dream for the dreamer is evidence of the large number of people surrounding her and her admirers at the same time. Ibn Shaheen, in his interpretation of seeing cucumbers in an unmarried woman’s dream, sees it as a sign that she will have a lot of money, abundant resources, and goodness, if the cucumbers are green and fresh. Interpretation of a dream about tomatoes Cucumbers for a married woman: A married woman who sees in her dream someone offering her tomatoes or eating them indicates improved living conditions and materials. Cucumbers in a married woman’s dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the feet

preview.html: Also, there are many differences regarding its interpretation by dream interpreters and through our website mqaall.com we will clearly show you many points of view and meanings of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the feetIn general, this dream is good news in terms of hearing happy news that gives the soul Happiness, joy, and seeing henna, whether on the legs or feet. It is a sign of the imminent disposition of problems and fears that the fortuneteller is experiencing during this period. Through the following lines, we will delve into the interpretation of this dream for many different situations in detail. This is in addition to presenting the opinions of leading interpreters and jurists such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and other famous scholars in the field of dream interpretation. See also: Interpretation of a dream about applying henna on hairInterpretation of a dream about henna on the feet by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that this dream is one of the most promising dreams that a person sees in a dream and also indicates the following: This dream makes... The dreamer feels optimistic and happy in his life in general. If this person is going through difficult times or has some problems. This dream indicates that these problems will be resolved soon. It also indicates that he will find positive and ideal solutions to the issues that need to be solved during this period. But If the sign is engaged or there is someone who intends to communicate with her during this period. Then she sees in her dream that the henna looks messy, and here this matter must be reconsidered again. It is also a sign for her that she does not despair and that God Almighty will compensate her with someone else. He will be of good conduct and behavior, and he will be greatly consoled. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the legs for a single woman. This dream, when an unmarried girl sees her in her dream, shows many indications, including: This vision indicates that this girl will soon achieve everything she wants and dreams of achieving. This dream also indicates That this girl will be engaged soon and that this matchmaker will be a good and righteous person who fears God Almighty. This dream also indicates that this girl is reaching the path that she has always been trying to reach. It will also achieve great degrees of success and excellence. If this girl is waiting for a promotion in her job ? This dream indicates that he will get it soon. But if she sees henna on her feet and she is happy, this indicates that joy has reached her. But if she is very sad, this indicates that this girl will get rid of her worries and achieve everything she aspires to in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about henna On the feet of a married woman: The interpretation of this dream for a married woman has different meanings, including: If a married woman sees henna on her feet in a dream. This shows a solution to the problems she faced in her married life. It also indicates that this woman will overcome any problem she may have with her husband. If you are currently thinking about something; It shows that he will soon reach an appropriate solution without delay. This dream also indicates that she will reach quick and radical solutions to the issues that concern her at this time. While if the woman who saw this

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-A'raf in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Araf in a dream by Ibn Shirin. This sign was mentioned by the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing Surat Al-Araf in a dream shows repentance to God Almighty and the way things go wrong. Also, seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Araf in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and problems that the dreamer faces in his dream and his life in general. Also, seeing Surat Al-A’raf hanging in a dream indicates achieving goals, success, and academic excellence, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-A’raf for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams of reading Surat Al-A’raf, this indicates the success and distinction with which she will shine. Also, seeing the Holy Qur’an thrown into A trash can indicates the disputes, problems, and tragedies that the girl will be afflicted with, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she has read Surat Al-A’raf for herself, this indicates a great and abundant livelihood and legitimate money. Seeing Surat Al-A’raf in a dream expresses the obstacles she faces in her life. If a married woman dreams that she is reading Surat Al-Araf, this means that her worries will dissipate and that she is pregnant with a male child. Also, if she sees that her husband is reading and reciting the Qur’an, this indicates that Her husband has entered a new job and will provide lawful money. To see Surat Al-A’raf hanging in a dream and then change its color means the loss of her husband in profitable trading and the loss of capital, and God knows best. Seeing Surat Al-A’raf in a married woman’s dream means the death of envious people from her home, a peaceful life, sustenance and money. And the end of disputes. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Araf in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Araf, this indicates the disappearance of her worries and the ease and facilitation of childbirth. Also, seeing Surat Al-Araf in a dream indicates success and distinction in life, treasure, and gaining a lot of money, And God knows best. This vision indicates that her husband will get a new job and will save a lot of halal money or join a lucrative business with one of his friends. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Araf in a dream for a man. If a merciful man sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Araf, this indicates the nearness of his marriage to A beautiful and righteous girl. Also, seeing yourself reading Surat Al-Araf in a dream means that things will naturally become easier and that the dreamer will enter a new job. Seeing yourself reading Surat Al-Araf in a dream may indicate self-development in one’s life and raising good offspring, and God knows best. Seeing Surat Al-Araf in a dream may indicate self-development in one’s life and raising good offspring, and God knows best. The norms in a dream for a married man indicate the collapse of disputes between him and his wife and the existence of a peaceful life, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing pomegranates in a dream: Eating pomegranate fruit in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansPomegranate in a dream Interpretation of seeing pomegranate fruit in a dream Pomegranate is considered one of the favorite fruits used in a wide range of cooking. It is one of the fruits that provides the body with a high nutritional value and also contains a high percentage of iron and vitamins. Seeing pomegranate fruit in a dream has many interpretations, which vary. Depending on the situation in which the pomegranate fruit appears, here we show you in detail the interpretation of seeing the pomegranate fruit in a dream. Interpretation of seeing pomegranates by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing sweet pomegranates shows in a dream that you will earn a lot of money without getting tired and without effort. As for eating a pomegranate in a dream, and its taste was sour, This indicates earning money through illegal means, and is deprived. As for the one who takes a pomegranate and finds many cracks in it, this dream indicates that he will marry a single woman and marry an already married woman. If there are no cracks in the pomegranate, this indicates the marriage of a virgin. And the sick person who sees in the dream He eats red pomegranates, this indicates the recovery of the disease and the eradication of the disease. As for the one who eats pomegranates, the pomegranate seeds are white from the inside, and this indicates that he receives money. Interpretation of seeing pomegranates by Ibn ShahinIbn Shaheen interpreted that seeing someone eating pomegranate seeds in a dream means gaining money, fame, influence, and power. For one who eats the outer peel of a pomegranate, it shows that the dreamer has no security and feels fear. As for one who eats sour pomegranates, this dream does not bode well, as it indicates distress, worry, and sadness. As for a married man who dreams that his wife gives him a basket full of pomegranates, this indicates his wife’s love for him. And that she will protect him and give birth to good offspring from him. As for whoever cuts a pomegranate in a dream, it breaks family ties. As for whoever eats the pomegranate and does not like its taste, this indicates that he will move to a new place of residence. Interpretation of buying and selling pomegranates in a dream. Whoever dreams of buying and selling pomegranates is one who has permitted For himself, what is forbidden for others. As for the woman who saw in her dream that she was selling pomegranates, this indicates that she will fall into forbidden trade and trade with her body. Selling pomegranates in a dream is an unpleasant dream that indicates tension, sadness, and problems that will be transmitted to the dreamer. As for buying pomegranates, it is a dream. Praiseworthy, because it indicates the repentance of the dreamer from his sins. As for whoever sees himself standing in front of the flower seller and does not buy, this indicates that he made a mistake and that he will be held accountable for it before the judiciary. See planting pomegranates in a dream. Whoever dreams that he is planting pomegranates, this dream indicates that he will gain a lot of money. Money is a person who has treasures. Therefore, we offer you all possible interpretations of seeing pomegranate fruit in a dream. For anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article via the Shamloul website.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about hugging a single woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about embracing a single woman: Seeing an embrace in one’s dream indicates many associations. A hug can symbolize familiarity, brotherhood, friendliness, gratitude and thanksgiving, depending on the vision and the person. It could be a father, brother or friend. Jurists also suggest other interpretations in the event that you do not know this person, then we find that the interpretation of a dream about hugging a single woman includes hundreds of different meanings, such as praise, beloved, and other abhorrent ones that could threaten her with harm. Hugging Dream Interpretation for a Single Woman When interpreting a dream about hugging a single woman, jurists provide meanings Different, such as: Scientists have agreed that the interpretation of a dream of a hug with laughter for a single woman indicates upcoming joy. While seeing a suffocating hug in a girl’s dream may indicate the separation of a loved one. Hugging from behind in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a pleasant surprise if One of them is one of her relatives. The dry hug in the dreamer’s vision is a vision that warns her of the presence of hypocrites and deceivers among the environment. But if the hug in the girl’s dream is comfort, then it is a sign of brotherhood, friendship, and love. Seeing single people shaking hands and hugging someone may symbolize the return of an expatriate from His travels. Interpretation of a dream about embracing an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of a dream about embracing an unmarried woman, Ibn Sirin mentioned several interpretations, the most important of which are: Ibn Sirin says that if an unmarried woman sees herself hugging her quarrelsome boyfriend in a dream, this is evidence of peace and the end of strife. Seeing a girl hugging Her mother in a dream shows affection, love, and the need for a mother’s care and care. The chest of a lover in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she is thinking about marriage. Ibn Sirin added, in interpreting the dream of an unknown breast in an unmarried woman’s dream, that it is evidence of her excessive trust in others and lack of interest. It is used in dealing with it. Interpretation of a dream about embracing a single woman. Scientists do not praise tight embraces in a person’s dream, as we see in the following cases: Interpretation of a dream about a tight embrace of an unmarried woman and her crying indicates farewell and separation from those around him, whether on a trip, in a decisive dispute between them, or in death. Seeing a girl hugging someone tightly indicates her attachment to him and the fear of even thinking about leaving her. If the dreamer sees a stranger hugging her tightly in the frenzy that the mother is trying to escape from, this indicates the approach of a disreputable person who is flirting with her and wants to enter into a romantic relationship with her. Interpreted by Al-Nabulsi Tight embrace in one dream is a sign of connection to the world and neglect of the afterlife. Interpretation of a dream of hugging a dead person for a single woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a single woman hugging a dead person in her dream? Interpretation of a dream about a dead man’s chest for an unmarried woman indicates longing for him. As for seeing a dead woman hugging her while she is crying, perhaps It indicates his need for prayers and charity. Hugging the dead in a dream is a sign of the return of the absent or the end of a quarrel in the girl’s life. Embracing the deceased in one dream and crying can symbolize migration away from his family. Interpretation of a dream of hugging and crying for a single woman: Crying

title: Original interpretation of dreams in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and its most important meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream that I am praying today, through our article, we will learn it. Interpretation of a dream that I am prayingInterpretation of a dream that I am prayingPrayer is one of the pillars of religion, and it is one of the most important pillars on which Islam relies heavily. Without prayer, a Muslim cannot accept work or even a supplication as follows: Ibn Sirin interpreted the dreamer’s vision in Dreaming that he is performing prayer, this indicates that his prayer will be answered in all circumstances, which indicates to me that he is walking on the straight path and obeying God in all his seclusion and movements. The meaning of the vision that the dreamer sees is that God Almighty will respond to all the supplication he makes, especially in prostration. It explains the meaning of the vision Prayer in a dream indicates how much joy and happiness the dreamer will have in the near future to change his situation from one situation to a better one. Fulfilling duties in a dream indicates that the dreamer is executing trust to his people as quickly as possible and that he is able to fulfill his promise. If the dreamer at the time of seeing it feels distressed, then this It indicates the relief of his distress and the revelation of his sadness. Also, seeing prayer in its essence is an indication that the dreamer will convey a message, because this message relates to his servants. The Sunnah prayer for the dreamer indicates his good morals and the purity of his heart. It is one of those praiseworthy visions in which there is nothing wrong with it in any way. See also: Interpretation of a dream of red roses in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about prayer for a married woman. There are many different details that affect, in one way or another, the interpretation of the dream, such that the social status of the dreamer plays an important role in it, in addition to the psychological state that he is experiencing. The interpretation of prayer for a married woman is as follows: It refers to the stable marital life that she is currently living, in addition to enjoying good health, psychological balance and emotional satisfaction. Seeing prayer in a dream for a married woman symbolizes many desires that she seeks to achieve, and which she will be able to achieve. All in the near future. If the dreamer is barren, this is an indication that God will bless her in the near future with childbirth. The vision heralds abundant sustenance and a lot of goodness for the dreamer and his entire family. Praying in a dream shows his commitment and discipline so that he can shoulder many responsibilities since his childhood. If it is The wife is committing a sin at the present time, so this is a sign of her return to God Almighty, and the sincere repentance that will bring her back to her sanity, and move on the right path.
